body.name: Main Street Forge All American Leather Belt | Made in USA | Men's Heavy Duty Work Belt | EDC Belt

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Main Street Forge Store

features: This Heavy Duty Work Belt is a Simply a Stud! You won't confuse this single slab of Old World, Veg-Tanned, Full Grain American Steer Hide Leather with those other belts in your closet. Warning! Be careful with this belt, because once you put this thing around your waist, all of those other thin, cheap belts will end up staying in the closet because they just won't feel like enough!

One Belt for Everything! You can sport this thing as a work belt, or you can use it for something more casual. At 1 1/2 inches wide and nearly 1/4 of an inch thick, It's strong enough to use as an EDC Belt but stylish enough to wear with your favorite jeans. It can even be used for a light duty gun belt. Work or play; formal or casual, The All American Belt has you covered! If you're looking for a mens leather belt that is going to last a lifetime, you just found it!

When we say "The All American Belt" we mean it! The Buckle? American Made. The Leather? American Steerhide. The Screws? You guessed it, Made in USA! Even the box it comes in and the sticker that comes with it were both printed right here in America. We aren't messing around, we believe in this. Take a look at our competition. Where are their belts made?

We Still Make 'em Like They Used To! What that means is that we don’t cut corners. We don’t outsource manufacturing to the cheapest sweatshop we can find. We take time to make high quality products that are meant to last a lifetime. Our skilled craftsman use only the best materials to construct all of our premium products right here in the USA!

Lifetime Warranty Provided by Main Street Forge! We take pride in crafting products that are built to last. Because of our committment to quality, each Main Street Forge product comes with a robust Lifetime Warranty, provided directly by Main Street Forge. Buy yours with confidence today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The All American Leather Belt This Heavy Duty Work Belt is a Simply a Stud! You won't confuse this single slab of Old World, Veg-Tanned, Full Grain American Steer Hide Leather with those other belts in your closet. Warning! Be careful with this belt, because once you put this thing around your waist, all of those other thin, cheap belts will end up staying in the closet because they just won't feel like enough! When we say "The All American Belt" we mean it! The Buckle? American Made. The Leather? American Steerhide. The Hardware? You guessed it, Made in USA! Even the box it comes in and the sticker that comes with it were both printed right here in America. We aren't messing around, we believe in this. Take a look at our competition. Where are their belts made?

Made in the USA! Always 100% made in the USA. Our quality is unmatched and all our products will stand the test of time! We take our time and make high quality products that are meant to last a lifetime. Our skilled craftsman use only the best materials to construct all of our premium products right here in the USA! Three Color Options Available! Choose your favorite or just grab one of each:

There are two methods to find your size. Method A is the most accurate. This is how you find your Belt Size. Using a belt you currently wear, measure from the middle of the buckle to the hole that fits you best. If you are in between sizes, round up the larger size. Method B is quick and easy and should work for almost everyone. Just choose the pant size you normally wear and add 2 inches. For example if you wear a size 38 in pants, you should order a size 40 belt. Keep in mind each of our belts have 7 holes spaced 1 inch apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Belt - give the buckle a chance!
reviews.reviewText: This belt is really well made from full-grain leather. It’s going to last a long time. It’s thick yet not too heavy and if you follow the instructions on how to pick your size, the belt will fit perfectly.Some people have complained about the buckle that comes on the belt looks like it’s tarnished or not an even color. The buckle is made from brass and is going to patina over time into a beautiful color. My belt arrived looking how others described it, but after a few weeks of daily wear, the discoloration has already gone away.Time will tell if the belt withstands stretching with use. I hope the inside of the belt has anti-stretch material but we’ll see. For the very fair price I paid, I’m very happy with this belt. I would’ve paid more for it actually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and great looking belt
reviews.reviewText: I like the fit and the look of the belt. It goes well with jeans, very stylish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice belt
reviews.reviewText: This belt was a little expensive but it is really a high quality belt. I think it is worth the money it will outlast me. I recommend this belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Belt I've ever had
reviews.reviewText: Quality is second to none. Nice thick leather hold your pants up all day ! Its much thicker and sturdier than any belt I've ever owned. This will keep me from having to try suspenders for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used the size chart, and the fit is perfect. This is a handsome and sturdy belt, and I am one happy customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very strong belt
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to wait a bit before I did a review. When I first received the belt, it's very stiff. Does a great job at doing its job. I went with the size indicator for the belt which says to go a size up from from the pant size you wear I think. I should have went a size down, the material will stretch out a little bit upon daily wear. Which took me to the last hole on the belt, in fact, I just added an extra hole to keep my pants up. Also, the paint on the belt buckle over time comes off, which left a black mark on my under belly. I am 6'1" @340lbs, so far this belt after a few months is working. So yes, I would recommend buying this belt. Life time warranty on the belt is impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Belt I ever bought
reviews.reviewText: For some reason I "eat" belts. Could be I wear rough. Could be I could lose a few pounds and not stretch the eyes. Could be my high expectations that a belt look good.Well I appear to have found the answer. I have now had this belt for over six months and it looks just like when I got it. It is strong. It feels great. The eyes don't stretch out. It has worked with every pair of pants and shorts I own; although its width and thickness will make for a tighter fit slipping through some loops.I would highly recommend this belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little pricey but I think it's worth it
reviews.reviewText: We normally don't splurge a whole lot, but my husband was getting sick and tired of having to replace his belt every few years because they'd start to fall apart. He had earned enough points to get an Amazon gift card and decided to buy this. It's quite stylish and very well made. He is very happy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Redefine lo que es el AMERICAN MADE
reviews.reviewText: Un trabajo que supera el hecho a mano, convirtiéndolo en artesania.Acabados inmejorables con una atención al detalle pocas veces vista en productos de piel.La calidad de la piel es insuperable, lo que mas me sorprendió fue lo grueso de la pieza, aun asi con una suavidad y maleabilidad que provoca un gran confort desde el inicio.El precio puede resultar un poco alto, pero la relación calidad / precio es de lo mejor que podrás encontrar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Belt was delivered in pathetic condition, came all warped!
reviews.reviewText: Belt was completely messed up and warped out of shape! There was no proper box or anything to support it. I just can’t wear this belt. Belt is also very old and has spots on it like it’s been kept for realy long. Very disappointed!
